name: Just Die Already (itch)
description:
You play as a die with a unique ability. You can shoot a spread of bullets that contains as many bullets as your value. Larger spreads lower the amount of necessary accuracy, but a focused spread offers high damage and a high reward. Will you take your chances on a single shot? Beware though, getting hit or dashing creates enough force to roll your die to a different face, making you need to change your playstyle quickly and often.

Use WASD or arrows to move, Space to dash, and left click to shoot. P to pause.

The game will start quickly, so make sure to click on the game or use full screen so input will register. Press P if you need a second to think.
